name: Dawn Beasley (Eden)
text: I arrived a little early and had another appointment scheduled after my oil change. There was a storm approaching and so Tommy put 2 people on it. They had me out 8 min after my appointment. That's a high level of customer service that creates loyalty. Thank you!!

name: Michael White
text: Excellent customer service. Prices could be lower, however.

text: Been riding with Jackson Honda since 1985. They take care of their customers not only in sales, but in service and parts. Experience, inventory, knowledge, concern, community. Jackson Honda in Andalusia AL is a great place to buy Honda products.

resp.text: To be a "Manager" at Joe Hudson Collision Center is short of your professional stance.  In reference to the "ratings" you provided, you are commenting on the wrong business. But again, that goes back to your unprofessional stature, not much experience, and lack of maturity.  If you are going to appropriately address an issue please make sure you are doing it on the correct part of the business.  Thank you - Cathy Brown  -  General Manager

name: Dave Gilliam
text: Excellent staff, products and services. The best in the area. We wouldn't but from anyone else.

name: Brenda White
text: Friendly knowledgeable staff that went the extra mile to ensure I understood time-frame and costs

name: teresa allan
text: Always a good experience.  Guys are very nice, helpful and polite.

name: Carol Roberts
text: After spending years buying a new mower ever two or three summers we finally broke down and purchased a Honda from CTE. Although more expensive than one you might get at Sam's club, it has lasted 3 times longer than any mower we have ever owned. I like that we are able to get is serviced yearly at CTE as well, and their prices are reasonable. We will be buying our next mower there also.

name: Ender Dilo
text: Took a zero turn back for repairs because it was under warranty. It has been over a month and still no mower. Now we have to wait an additional two weeks for a part to come in. Then we have to run them down for a update. Bad business.

name: Anthony Guido
text: Didn't dislike this place just couldn't answer my question about matching up carburetor 2cylcle motor kits. But Lewis lawn Care on northern boulevard had all the right answers.

name: Robert Franklin
text:
It was good
Salesman was very helpful

name: Keturah Mace
text:
Best Customer Service Ever!!
The salesman, Eddie, is a jewel.

name: Mike Dodd
text: Took our chainsaw for repair. The pull cord had come out. When picking it up the first time after repair when we tried to crank it there at the store the cord came out again. We were told a part was broken and needed to be ordered. After several days part had still not come in, so we rented a chainsaw from them. When the part came in and again went to pick up the chainsaw upon returning home tried the chainsaw again. After about 3 pulls the cord once again came out . Took the chainsaw back once again and was told we were the problem. Totally unprofessional.

name: Charles Jackson III
text: Great people to do business.

name: Ramon Rosario
text: The guys here are the best in town with the lowest prices. You just don't get that combination anymore. Mike helped me out with the best product for my job as well as the most competitive price in town. (I checked four other places) David was extremely knowledgeable when fixing my equipment. He gave me advice on where to go and what I needed for all my future and current maintenance. I will absolutely come back here for rentals, purchases or services on any small engine equipment. They also support the troops.

name: David York
text: Very friendly, they will answer every question with patience and care. I enjoyed the experience.

name: Scott Ballinger
text:
David(DJ) recommended CTE and my Scag Tiger 2 mower.  All I can say is wow.  Great experience buying it, getting delivery, and service with first oil change.  I would use David and the rest of the crew without reservation.
Scag mowers are unbelievably good!

name: Alan campbell
text: Traveling and needed a new starting cord for generator . Got me in and out quick with great price and service. Tyler , the mechanic was super nice and helpful... answered questions I had about my generator.

name: Bevil Johnston
text: The Best

name: Mark Deuschle
text: I bought a new Scag Tiger Cat 2 from CTE about a week ago. I have to say this was an excellent experience Michael was very helpful worked very hard to help me through out the entire time. I was looking and comparing the John Deere to the Scag not once he Michael put down the John Deere he showed me the man6 advantages the Scag had over the John Deere. I also very much appreciated the honesty and integrity he displayed which also is a big reason I chose the Scag, I was lied to by a salesman at John Deere at one dealership and another dealership I was told that he could sell me the mower for the price but he wouldn’t make much so he didn’t want to sell it, those 2 experiences alone helped me decide that my after the sale experience probably would be as sorry also. Michael helped me select a Scag which is a very high end and high quality machine there was no pressure just friendly service and a willingness to answer all my questions. I highly recommend purchasing from CTE and Michael. Great job you’ve earned a customer for life!

name: Foster Dickson
text: Very disappointed in their service department. I took a broken push mower, which ended up being beyond repair, but the counter man couldn't tell me what was done (or not done) to it because the mechanic's notes were vague and indecipherable. It cost me $50 and a three-week wait to get nothing, not even a solid explanation. Moreover, despite a citywide mask ordinance, no one was wearing a mask.

name: Don Ladner
text:
I've done business with the crew at CTE  for many years and have never been disappointed. The attention to detail and service is paramount with them. I recently purchased a Land Master ATV from CTE. What a tank !. Perfect for hunting, farm work, etc....and it will go anywhere!
At half  the  price of  many ATVs it's a deal. It comes with a choice of name brand engines, hybrids or all electric. I chose a Honda and am very pleased.  CTE means quality!!!

name: jimmy griggs
text: Came in looking for a chainsaw. Talked to justin. He was very knowledgeable and assisted me in finding exactly what I needed. I was looking at something that was way more than what I needed and he told me that was too much so I sized down and even saved some money! Thanks again justin and CTE! Will be back.

name: Eddie Langford
text: Great deals on lawn mower and my brother got one today. Wonderful prices, rebates, VIP programs.

name: Robert Ingram
text: Micheal has been very professional and always eager to help along with a great service dept.

name: High Salute
text:
STOP!   DO NOT USE CTE!!! If I could rate ZERO stars, I would!

They tried to rip me off saying that my mower needed a lot more parts and labor than it actually needed!   I left and brought my mower over to Lewis Lawn Equipment on 231 and they did exactly what was needed for less than 1/2 the cost that fraudulent CTE was trying to get from me!!!

name: Gerard
text: Excellent place to shop especially if you are in the market for Steil products. I misspelled that!! Even though I did not purchase or order anything, I enjoyed the people working at the counter.

name: Sabrenia Sanders
text: Great sales staff. Friendly and knowledgeable.

name: Andrew Rolfsen
text: Top notch customer service. These guys know the law care business. We have been doing business with them for YEARS and have always been pleased. They are always very friendly and very informative.

name: silas bonner
text: Did a good job but not had the part I wanted

name: Robert Vinti
text: We stopped by the store just after closing time on a Saturday looking for a push mover.  The store employee saw us an re-opened the store for us.  He was very helpful by explaining the different models of mowers.  He also explained the warranty and additional warranties that we could purchase.  There was no high pressure and he took his time answering all our questions even though the store was officially closed.  We purchased a Honda mover and he even serviced it for us right then so we would not have to wait until Monday to pick it up.   We are very happy with our purchase and the service that we received.

name: edp445ftw 23
text: Excellent service and good prices.

name: MarcAnthoni Peacock
text: Great Service, the manager Mike is the best...

name: Conita Henderson
text: Didn't have what I wanted

name: Jeremy Fowler
text: The "Serialized Facility Associate"  here is absolutely incredible. Top Notch if you ask me...

name: Bodyrubs Montgomery
text: Seems to do a good business with the professionals. I had a small engine repair.  Good quality.

name: TT
text: Didn't have what we needed

name: John Bowman
text: They are very helpful and can usually get parts here that I can't get elsewhere even if it is not a brand the normally carry.  One of the few reasons I would come to Montgomery.

name: P Mason
text: Our church mower had a part break on the seat. Took it in and Justin ordered the part. Unfortunately the part was back ordered and they didn't know when the part was coming in. Tom made the decision to pull the part off of another mower and repair ours since we hadn't been able to cut the grass for 2 weeks. Went above and beyond and we appreciate it.

name: Jim Day
text:
Picked up on Friday, repaired and returned Tuesday. Repaired as requested and mechanically, it had a nice "tight" feel to it. Definitely inspired confidence in the repair. Also, I am embarrassed to say, the mower had a lot of grass clipping on the blade deck. It came back cleaned (they didn't have to do that, but it was really appreciated).

For those of us who do not have P/U trucks with trailers, their delivery service is a life saver.

Great friendly people, throughout the transaction.

name: Leah Autumn
text: I have never had a business try so hard NOT to help me! I came in to have a lawn mower repaired. The guy at the counter gave me all sorts of reasons why I should not have my lawn mower repaired...and didn't even try to sell me a new one, just didn't want to do the work. I would never do business with them....not that they would want to anyway. CRAZY!

name: Tad Wildman
text:
The convict-looking tattood guy at the front desk didn't even speak to me; too busy surfing the web & drinking coffee. the other lady had a very poor & disgruntled attitude, like she was pissed off that she had to put down her cigarette out back to 'help' me.

Take your business elsewhere if you expect courtesy and professionalism. If you need a $800 push-mower then this is the place for you! I'll never spend a dime in this shop, even though I loved my CTE in Auburn & have done business there for ten years.  Shameful.

Even though good help is hard to find: I would pay the extra $1/hr for somebody who will treat customers with respect. I came in this store to PAY for a service & ended up ordering my parts online and doing it myself.

This bad experience would be forgivable if they were busy and booming, but this was not the case. Their staff were just lazy & rude & condescending.

name: weldthangfake No
text: Very nice and helpful but they did have what I was looking for but nobody did.. never netch market

name: You did What
text: Great place to get lawn care gear.

name: Blake Harrison
text: Amazing people! Incredibly helpful and knowledgeable!

name: Danny Bolt
text: Great people, service, has what you need to take care of your yard and more. GOD bless these guys.

name: Antonio Moss
text: Great  !!

name: Kel Moy
text: Quality ATV's and mowers and all you need for your lawn. Lawn equipment repairs are done here by certified repair technicians. Flexible financing is offered on ATVs and sit mowers.

name: David Raphael
text: Everyone from top to bottom at CTE are friendly and professional.  I had a warranty dispute with Briggs and Stratton about a problem with a new engine.  They told me to take it to and authorized B&S svc ctr.  CTE inspected the engine and reported their findings to B&S.  They explained my situation but warranty was denied by B&S.  I persisted for over a month and finally gave up in frustration.  I went to pick up my ruined machine and pay for the labor etc.  There was a little confusion as to how to handle the bill and a gentleman named, Bruce wanted to know what the story was with my mower.  It's a long one but he listened and  agreed that something was wrong.  He said leave it here, send him an email with the whole story and he'd make a few calls.  A week later he called and said B&S had reconsidered and was giving full compensation.  I couldn't believe it, as I am a rare customer.  I brought the mower home yesterday and saw a sign as I was leaving.  Bruce Holder was his name and he was the owner.  Now that is customer service from top to bottom!  I cannot give these folks any possible higher grade or praise.  So I bought them all donuts!  They have a customer for life with me.  I cannot recommend them enough.  Thanks all.

name: Lorita Peiffer
text: This shop is the best. They were so helpful. I will buy from them only !!!!!

name: Anthony Cameron
text: Worst place to go for repairs. Don't waste your time coming here.

name: Norman Simmons
text:
Really worked with us on financing or new zero turn
The mower itself seems heavy duty so far for is price range,  cuts great

name: Angel Barbosa
text: All of the service technicians are very respectful, professional and knowledgeable of parts and equipment. For this new purchase, my wife and I met Mr. Nate. Mr. Nate is a wonderful young man, who in my opinion is an asset to your store.

name: Rashad Houston
text: Great place

name: Joseph Smith
text: They carry best in outdoor equipment but their high

name: Tony Allen
text: I have purchased equipment from CTE and the experience has been good.  Calvin helped me with my recent purchase and he did a good job advising me during the process.

text: They went the extra mile to make sure that a big Christmas gift made it under the tree on time. Every guy working behind the desk was professional and friendly. Will buy from them again.

Had pleasure of being the tech on lunch break to come back to inventory manager doing work I had already performed repairs too and behing a commisission based job having a hourly staff member perform techs work...hmmmm some ones pocket getting bigger lol. Scam artist you are.

text: My husband bought a landmaster 300 this summer. Love it so much the people there are so nice and willing to go the extra mile to help great group of people.

name: Niko Corley
text: Personnel explained differences in their products thoroughly to help me make a decision.  My sales rep Calvin worked with me to get me up and running.  Would certainly buy from CTE again in the future .

text: Friendly people

name: Autumn Carlisle
text: I had/continue to have a great experience with them. Andre had me in and out of this place in under an hour with keys in hand. He was very friendly to not only me but also my daughter as well. Every time I go in the office, they are always so friendly. They are also great working with you on payments if something comes up. When we decide to buy a second vehicle, it will be with A & M.

name: Kimberly Handley
text: Great staff I saw ad on Facebook of a car I was interested in contacted them and was all set with my approval and ready to go before I visited I test drove and was very happy with vehicle selection all nice newer model cars with good mileage my car drives great they worked with me on my payments that I could afford and downpayment I would recommend them great team

name: Treba C. Harris
text: They are so nice and let's you make your own decisions on the car you want

name: Viridiana Romero
text: This place is the place to go for a car or truck. I worked with Andre and he went above and beyond to make sure I was satisfied with my truck and the loan process. He has great customer service and I was very pleased with him and the business. I will definitely be back and will refer people to them. Again thanks Andre for everything you did I am very grateful!!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Andre Pires
text: Excellent dealer, friendly people and nice inventory! I recommend this car lot.

name: jibreel mekdad
text: the people there were friendly and great, they gave me a great deal and the car was in excellent condition. If i could give more than 5 stars i would.

name: Otis Lee Phillips Jr
text: Great 👍 I brought a car months ago. And I tell my people to come check them out quickly get you riding

resp.text: Thank you Mrs Phillips!

name: Jonathan Bryant
text:
WORST EXPERIENCE OF OUR LIVES!!
these 4 and 5 star reviews have to be fake or paid for. have to be!
I got a car from them a little while back , charged almost 6000$ over what the car was worth and was assuming I was getting a decent  car. NOPE!
It’s completely undriveable,I spent every penny our family had in the bank and everything I could borrow and I’m still paying payments and it’s sitting in a shop till I can pay the rest of the bill.
They knew about the problems and lied to my face !
Stay far away

resp.text: Hi Jonathan, I am sorry to hear about your experience with A&M Auto Sales. I can assure you that management has changed since then. We are very different now and strive to provide the best service possible!

name: Robert Bates
text: Stay away! They are deceptive and cheats. I bought a truck from them at an outrageous price (had no options at the time and needed a truck A.S.A.P. for business) and I have spent over $5,000 fixing it in the 6 months I've owned it. I was told by Lee and the "salesman" that the truck was $11,000, only to charge me $13,000. Of course once I realized what they did and contacted them they play dumb and it is too late. I know if I should have taken more time to review and ask questions but it was the end of the day, past business hours already and I needed to leave with the truck that day. Regardless you should never practice those business ethics in any industry. I have had to change the rotors, brakes, brake drums, brake cylinder, master cylinder, calipers and brackets, hub assembly, CV axles, steering arm, I am in the process of changing the transfer case (over $2,000 on it's own) and it still needs a steering column, gear box, front differential, driveshaft and possibly the rear differential. When it's all said and done I will have put at least 5 times the value of this truck into making it run right and paying it off. I am a self employed remodeler and I have missed countless days of work, lost countless jobs and it's gotten to the point that I am having trouble paying for my daughters daycare and buying her essentials. This whole deal has radically ruined my life. These people knew the situation I was in and absolutely took full advantage. Beware!!!

resp.text: Hi Robert, I am so sorry to hear about the terrible experience you had with A&M Auto Sales. Our management has changed since then. We now have a great team behind us to help with any issues with the vehicles for future or current customers!

name: Marvin McCoy
text: I highly recommend this place if you are looking for a car!!!! They had what I wanted, and did what was need to get me driving the same day!!! Thanks Mr. Lee and special thanks to Tommy

name: John Galliera
text: Never been.

resp.text: Hello John, thank you for the 3 star review. You can come in and visit us at 518 1st Street North, Alabaster, AL. 35007 . We are close by the Shelby Baptist Hospital, we will be happy to help you find a new vehicle.

name: Shalanda Hill
text: Me an my Husband has had no problems at all so come in an purchase u a car👌

resp.text: Thank you Mrs Hill for everything!!!

name: Chris Davis
text: Card not clean drove car came back smoking I think bad cars  but that's my thoughts

resp.text: Hello Mr. Davis, we are sorry about your experience with our vehicles. We are now under different managment and can assure that the vehicles are now thoroughly cleaned. I hope that you can give us another chance in the future!

name: John Hall
text: Great sellers they really understood my situation and got me a great deal I recommend this business to everyone. Thanks you guys

resp.text: Thank you for rating A & M Auto Sales, Inc

name: William Davis
text: Great group of people. Made my buying experience excellent and highly recommend this place!

name: David Blakeman
text: The parts guy was very helpful and pleasant to. Staff was freindly also will go back thanks

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to review! We value your business.

name: Chris Archie
text: Went in to browse and look around. Very nice and knowledgeable staff and they answered all questions quickly and thoroughly. They were never pushy like some salesman treat you.

resp.text: Thank you for your positive review! We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience.

name: Jesse Neumeyer
text: What a joke. Salesmen and manager were completely rude, asking $2k over msrp and wouldn't even allow us to test ride the bike. Just waiting for this "dealer's" inevitable downfall.

name: David Clay
text: Great staffing got my bike in without an appointment.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experience!

name: Jerry Persons
text:
Darryl in parts dept. , Only reason I go to Halls Motorsports. I pay to much for parts ,oil , etc.....Darryl being one of the last , who appreciates old school Honda ,Yamaha three wheelers is a pleasure talking to him about them on my visits....

The new machines for sale in the show room , are non negotiable, markedup , bend you over deals ....

I don't operate like that......

name: Aaron Coppola
text: What a team, what an experience.  Andy and Bob were fantastic.  The process could not have been better and I got a great price as well.  The team at Hall's really care about the little people and went out of thier way to make a great experience for me.  I live 400 miles away and will travel back for all of my future purchases.  Pioneer 700-4 Deluxe!

name: Angel McGhee
text: Do not use the service department!!! They quoted $300 more than the service department we used elsewhere for the exact same problem. We were told before going there not to use them for service because they're known for ripping people off, but because it's the closest to us, we decided to give them a try. Everyone we spoke to in the service department was extremely rude, didn't want to assist and definitely didn't know how to communicate. I wouldn't suggest this service department for anything!

resp.text: While we are sorry to here about your negative experience, our system indicates that you were not a customer at this location.

name: Leisa Holland
text: Will be the first place we go if we ever want another motorcycle or ATV.  Andy was outstanding and the entire staff treated us great! Couldn't ask for better service and of course the bike is awesome!!!#

name: Dona Dooley
text: Poor costumer service. We walked in to this place to check-out some bikes and wanted to ask questions about the availability. The lady around each corner completely ignore us. Just ignore us. My husband went it to to ask the lady she just ignore him. They could have sold one today. Poor services!

name: Shawn Hall
text: Good place for parts and repair

name: Brad Penton
text: Whatever you do, DO NOT let them work on anything that you own.  I spent over $1,300.00 with them to repair my Honda four wheeler.  The say to only run marine gas in it.  They replaced the carburetor and put regular unleaded gas in it.  They charged me $3.50 for a gallon of gas.  More than marine gas would be.  They did not tell me this when I picked it up that they put regular gas in it.  It sat for four months with Covid-19 and work keeping me from using it.  Guess what?  The brand new carburetor now has to be serviced because of the gas they put in it.  They are more than happy to repair what THEY caused, for an additional $300.00.  These guys are crooks!  If I could give them negative stars, I would.

resp.text: There is no OEM warranty that covers gasoline solidification (which is caused by months of non-use). No machine can sit up for 4 months with any type of gas and not cause issues. It is your responsibility to either put stabilizer in fuel or periodically start up the machine.

name: Sheretta Williams
text: Everyone  was so nice.

name: Howard Strum
text: Great place,knowledgeable staff.

name: MACK Finch
text: Parts department awsome. To many extra fees added to the machines. Had sticker for a can am 570 at $8978 otd price $11,200 . Guess thats all the power sport stores. They did drop to $11k for me but still out of my budget. Great sales person Mrs. Kim very knowledgeable about the product.

name: Richard O’neal
text: I now know why they call these people the “home of the bait and switch”. This is the second time I’ve tried to do business with these people. By the looks of the other reviews it seems they have not made an effort to correct it which is the saddest part.

name: Norman Redo
text: Nice staff. To bad halls won't carry better helmets like shoei and arai

name: James Irby
text:
I purchased a 2021 Honda Pioneer 1000-3
With the following options
4500 lb Warren Winch with synthetic rope
Soft door extenders
Honda roof
Honda front windshield
Honda rear window
Overhead gun rack
Rear view segmented mirrow.
I just got back from having top and rear window installed. I took delivery of machine last Thursday as I wanted to use at huntn camp .
I want to give a shout out to all involved in the sales , parts and delivery of this machine.
Bob Smith is a great asset to the company. Andy was a huge help as he did a lot of the original deal workup.
Cindy in parts was fabulous in going over the various options that was aval . She really knows the parts and was a great help. Think you Cindy.
Jack in service was awsome. His knowledge of the Honda ATV and SXS is really amazing. He made sure I was comfortable with every aspect of the machine. I put 25 miles on it last weekend and was blown away by the power and operation of machine. It performed flawless.
Thanks to all it truley was a pleasure working with each of you.
I will definitely reccomend to anyone wanting to buy a ATV / UTV to give Halls a chance I don't think you'll be disappointed.
Ps
I bought a Honda Formen 4 wheeler 8 years ago Oct. 2012 The unit has only had one sparkplug  one battery and regular oil change at dealer. This was  the  reason I went back to Halls for this machine. The 4 wheeler has about 1600 miles on it .
Thanks
James Irby

name: Bobby Harrelson
text: This was one of my favorite buying experience because Hall's Honda get you what you need at a fair price and are just straight up people. I just bought a 2020 Honda TRX520 and it is awesome.

name: Don LeMay
text: Lots of inventory to choose from. Motorcycle or four wheelers.

name: Charlie Babin
text: Showed up expecting to buy a Honda 2200i generator for the advertised website price of $999 and was told that was for the 2018 model and the ones they carry are $1249. Waited around in the showroom for several minutes for an answer. Guess it's the customers fault they don't update inventory and prices. Would have made a purchase had they not been shady. Wilson Dismukes had the generator for $1049, so did Lowe's and Amazon. Hard to believe a certified Honda dealer can have their prices beat by every 3rd party dealer in town. Not my first bad experience here. Beware!!

name: Jack Redpath
text:
Over the years, I’ve owned every type of the “Big Four” - Honda, Yamaha, Suzuki, Kawasaki  -  motorcycles, ATVs, and UTVs .  When it comes to quality and reliability you can’t beat Honda!  I won’t buy anything else!

I’m all about customer service … so much so that I drive 6 hours out of my way to buy from Hall’s Motorsports in Mobile, AL.    Andy Stacy, the sales manager, and Bob Smith, the finance lead, have always treated me with courtesy, honesty, respect, and the best price.  As long as Andy and Bob are there, I’ll always buy from Hall’s.  If you’re looking for the best, give Andy a call. You won’t be sorry!

Jack O’Rourke
Panama City

resp.text: Wow, Jack, thank you so much! Customers like you are why we love what we do. We very much appreciate your business and the time you took to share your experience!

name: Keith schwarzauer
text: Andy in sales great and Bob in finance wonderful...great deals friendly staff ...will def be back for service and sales  ....

name: Dewayne Richardson
text: Great people to do business with .

name: Brandon Jenkins
text: This is a good place to do business. Great prices, honest people. I would highly recommend them to anyone I care about.

name: benthere123
text: Outstanding customer service!! Drove from Pensacola FL to purchase a new motorcycle because the deals at Halls are much better than anything that I have local. Andy is my salesman and he went above and beyond to accommodate me . Prices are very realistic and they are willing to negotiate, you will also get a discount on merchandise if you purchase a vehicle here. I will definently do all my future business with this outstanding dealership. Thanks for putting the customer first!

name: Nathan Courtney
text: Thomas was the most pleasant salesman I’ve ever experienced! Definitely will return thanks to him.

name: T Harris
text: Good prices but they are horrible at answering the phone and returning phone calls.

name: Michael Wilson
text: They are friendly and helpful and fast. Buying here was stress free. I will definitely buy here again

resp.text: Thank you, Mr. Wilson! We love hearing that you had a good experience and appreciate you taking the time to review us.

name: ctesuper USER
text: EXCELLENT folks!!! EXCELLENT experience!! Will be spending my dollars here for all future purchases and accessories!! Highly recommended

resp.text: Thanks so much, Meredith! We are happy to have you as a customer and appreciate you taking the time to share your experience!

name: Chinnis Fishing
text: Did the online finance option for a $7,000 YAMAHA and it was a disaster. They called just to tell me I was denied and didn’t give me a reason. Wouldn’t even talk to me for me to ask. They were unfriendly and rushed me off the phone. I won’t be doing business with them ever. P.s. I was financed for $30,000 at Hattiesburg Cycle thanks sending me that way

name: andrew casey
text: Very friendly and knowledgeable staff. They really know their stuff.  Both locations in mobile are awesome. I walked in not having a clue and they made sure I knew all I needed to know about their inventory. Keep up the good work!

name: Joe King
text:
I called Hall's Thursday morning and talked with salesman Will. he was straight forward on everything about buying their advertised Honda Valkyrie and after posting a $300 deposit so they could prep the bike I was on my way from Pensacola Fl to pick it up.  All employees were just great and the important features of the bike were pointed out especially how to open the gas cap by remote key location.
Thanks guys as you all did me right and so happy with my new Bike

name: Kathryn Stringfellow
text: Though we are satisfied with our bike purchase we are very unsatisfied with our visit for the "first service" today. When we purchased the bike we were asked if we wanted to purchase a "service plan" we asked did this include future oil changes, etc. We were told "yes". So we purchased the "service plan" for $799. We took the bike in today for the first service only to be told that this was actually an "extended warranty!" Although the buyers order CLEARLY READS it as a SERVICE CONTRACT! We would have not EVER purchased a new vehicle of any sort without a service contract. The buyers contract is very misleading and lead us to believe that we were indeed purchasing the service contract that we inquired about. Very disappointed!

name: Chuck Pace
text: I bought a new 1000-3 LE Pioneer. I bought it in for service and was charged a 100.00 cleaning fee. I dont dog my machine. It had rained and it had some light mud in the tire well. I drove from Dothan,Al to buy this machine and thought I would be treated better than this. I really dont mind the fee but the so called cleaning that was done was absolutely ridiculous.  Not clean at all. I will never do business with them again.

name: Ashley Whitlow
text: We live 2 hours in Florida and Thomas took amazing care of us. Got everything ready for us by the time we got there. Just a great experience with great people!

name: Johnny Kuts
text: Home of the bait and switch, beware. What you see online and "in stock" is far from it.

name: Mark Kluge
text: False advertised prices, and rude sales staff.

name: Ace Cannon
text: Easily one of the best Motorsports shops I've ever been in. All the staff are awesome and fun. Really enjoyed it.

name: RB Nelson
text:
I took a dirt bike to the Government St location in Mobile AL for repairs and was told they would straighten the handlebars for $100. After pickup I was charged the $100 and told they don’t straighten handlebars! I called and the service manager was unwilling to either refund the $100 or straighten the handlebars. He even refused to admit they charged me for straightening the handlebars and read the receipt which said nothing about my handlebars. I know what I was told would be done when I was quoted a price, they ripped me off. I would HIGHLY recommend not doing business with these crooks!
Update: In response to the owner’s reply... Your service manager was unprofessional and argumentative, repeatedly talking over me during our short conversation. I asked to be transferred to “the owner” because I thought you’d actually listen to a customer’s complaint, but I was told you were not there and I quote your service manager “I am the only one you’re going to deal with”. Sadly he was right because I still haven’t received a phone call from you to hear my side of the story.
I’ve heard stories about how you treat your customers. I’m just glad I learned my lesson on a dirt bike repair, not a purchase. Fortunately was only overcharged $100 but that’s enough to lose my business and spread the word for others to go elsewhere.
Don’t just take my word for it Mobile, I suggest you ask around before you do business with Hall's.

resp.text: We regret this customer feels this way about his service experience.  It is our company policy to not straighten handlebars if they are bent due to the structural damage that has been caused, for the safety of our customers.  Safety is our utmost priority and we were upfront that we cannot straighten/bend damaged handlebars.   We suggested to replace the handlebars, which was declined by the customer.  The only charges, stated in the customer's receipt, was for the replacement of front tire, oil change, and safety inspection.  We offered to repair the customer's damaged forks, triple clamps, and handlebars and unfortunately, those repairs were declined.

name: Phil Chavanne
text: Got my Goldwing serviced here: nicely done and fast. Was on a trip and pressed for time: they arranged that I could go on a lift immediately. That's good service. And while the bike was serviced I could discuss the tech specs of the new Honda models -- cool people they know their stuff. Recommended.

name: Richard “Buddha” Keele
text: Really helpful with explaining different models and their capabilities

name: steve kent
text: I've had my bike serviced a couple of years ago,  priced extremely high, yet, a year and half later a friend with same issue and same type bike had the same repair done, and was a little over half the price of what I was charged earlier. I even had parts replaced that was replaced a few months earlier and had nothing to do with my issue.  Sales might be alright,  I'll never know, but, service is absolutely no good and overpriced. Friend had to take his bike over to Florida dealer to had repair redone,  and discovered friend paid for things never done by Halls Honda.

name: kobyaustin1
text: Clean place, really helpful staff, and is bright and non overwhelming

resp.text: Thank you so much! We are grateful for your positive feedback!

name: Savanna Mathers
text: Thomas was amazing he’s the best salesman possible! Super nice really funny😀

name: Michael Hollingsworth
text: Great experience and great place to purchase motorcycle supplies.  I can always find the maintenance supplies I need.  I also got a nice jacket at a good price.  They're always willing to help you find what you need.

name: CiCi Douglas (CiCi)
text:
I called and talked to Jonathan yesterday about a 4 wheeler I was interested in.  MY wife allowed me to come today and let me buy one. We were greeted at the door by a very nice and respectful crew of staff.  Jonathan is a great salesman, kind, considerate and genuine.  Very pleased with all the service.  Good deal and Jonathan fought for us to get what we wanted. Very pleased    EXCEPT FOR HAVING TO ASK A QUESTION ABOUT A FREE SHIRT AND HAT.   THE CELL PHONE APP LINK IS NOT ACCESSIBLE I HAD TO WAIT AN EXTRA 20 MINUTES TO JUST GET THIS RIGHT
Wanda G. Pierre
William A, Pierre

name: joshua peters
text: Had a great experience getting my new bike up there every one was very nice. If you go up there be sure to ask for Thomas.

name: Allie Houston
text: Great customer service I will be back to do business with them

name: James Miller
text: Has nothing in inventory that’s on the website

name: steve poulos
text: Purchased a new 2018 GROM  from HALLS,  I have purchased 2 new Yamaha wave runners from HALLS also in the past, purchases and service  has always been great. Jack that works in the back is awesome. yes I do recommend HALLS for all your power play toys. THANKS  HALLS.

name: Erik Albrecht
text: Very reasonable pricing here.  Wide selection of accessories available to make your bike just what you want.  The staff are friendly, very knowledgeable and go out of their way to help you out.  Don't shop anywhere else but here!

name: Nathan Brewer
text: This place is fantastic! I would recommend anyone looking to buy a new Honda to make this your first stop. The sales team was very knowledgeable, and answered all my questions. I also bought aftermarket parts from the parts department and they were very friendly and helpful too! Halls Honda made me feel like family from the moment I walked in. This is the only Honda dealership I will ever use from now on!

name: Darian Forsberg
text: The Service Staff is top notch. Very Helpful. You can really tell they appreciate their customers. Parts department very knowledgeable and helpful. I would definitely recommend them to anyone

name: who dat
text: Thomas at Halls Honda in Mobile Alabama is an amazing salesman and very easy to work with getting a new bike.

name: Dana Berry
text: Thomas, at Hall's Honda is amazing. Go see him for all of your bike wants or needs!

name: DonTrip Gaming
text: Thomas  is awesome  this the best   salesman  I've  met.very great  company  clean friendly business.

name: Brandon Courtney
text: Great BJ’s.

name: Dee howard
text: Excellent staff great customer service

resp.text: Thank you, Mr. Howard! We appreciate you and all of our customers!

name: Joalex Diaz
text: Poor communication with customer, don’t do a credit application online because if you do they will take a lot of days to let you know yes, no or never answer , priority for them probably home town customer or people can probably be at the store , if you are a customer looking for a quick respond from them because you want to make sure you will get approve on watercraft hey don’t do it because you will waiting for no respond from them , also I call today for speak with the GM apparently Mr. Morris I do apologize if I don’t spelling his name correctly but all I have is waiting on the phone until they hang out the phone call WHAT a SERVICE ridiculous

name: Thomas Womack
text: Purchased my first bike from here, and it wont be my last! Great atmosphere, friendly employees who know what they are talking about and of course great prices on a variety great products! I definitely recommend this store to others.

name: Bryce Peters
text: Great service from Cameron, really helped me fit the right bike for me. Awesome showroom and knowledgeable staff. Would highly recommend to all new riders who are  looking for a place to get started.

name: EVELINE DENNIS
text: Never will recommend this business to anyone. Stated interest rate on phone to my husband and then upped the rate once he got down to their business.  Offered him certain parts from his trade in and then changed their minds. Seems funny that the salesman and finance person were no longer there when we started to ask questions about the parts. Never again.

resp.text:
Hello Eveline,
I am sorry to hear of your negative experience.  I have not found any record of your calling our dealership and it is policy to not give interests rates over the phone.  Is it possible this happened at another location/dealership?  Please feel free to call me at 251-509-0102 and I will be happy to personally assist you.
Andy, General Manager

name: LEVERN WILLIAMS JR
text: GREAT PLACE WITH A GREAT STAFF STOP TODAY AND SEE ALEX OR THOMAS THOSE GUYS KNOW THEIR PRODUCTS VERY INFORMATIVE!!!

name: Katie Hennis
text: Very friendly staff, they were also very knowledgable about everything we asked about when looking into purchasing a bike! Nice, clean atmosphere! I would highly recommend checking this place out!

name: justin w
text: The guy I dealt with was Thomas and he was really cool and really helped me alot

name: Dare Devil Diablo
text:
(Edited 4/30/19)

I bought a new $12,000 bike from Mobile Halls Honda in 2016.  This was my second brand new $10,000+ Honda.  I recently purchased a $10,000+ KTM elsewhere (Not from Halls) because I could not get this dealer to work with me.

First Red Flag, the bike had 14 miles on it at delivery.  I guess someone took it home for the night...  (They did disclose the mileage at the time of sale.)

Later, I had some issues and wanted the bike looked at under warranty.  I was told they would charge me to look at it if they could not submit a warranty claim to Honda.  This is lack of basic customer service.  If you want your customers to come back you take care of them.  Take care of your customer and they will take care of you.

Later still, I wanted to trade in my paid off bike that I purchased from them for a new one.  They told me if I wanted to trade in that they would "give me a good price" for my bike because I bought it from them and I'm buying another.  Great!!!, or so I thought...  They offered me about 80% of my motorcycles KBB Trade in Value.  80% of Trade In!!!  My bike is in like new condition, air conditioned garage kept!!

So long story short, I guess I am done with Mobile Honda.  I guess I wont rule out Halls in general...  Its kind of tough with them being the only game in town.

name: A.K. Big Dog
text: Bought a 3 year service plan for 2 Seadoo's,dropped them off one week to be "serviced", they sat in the same spot for 3 days.When I went back to get them they had never been touched.I marked the tires because I was suspicious this had happened before.Not even offered a receipt.Because they hadn't done jack ! I'll drive to Gulfport, Gulfcoast Moror sports and trailer my new ATV home.

name: Margie Rathers
text: Women Beware! Do not work for this company. The owner is a narcissist with a superiority complex. His demeanor and interactions with women attest to the fact he views women as beneath him. He does not value his employees and thinks he can do all their jobs, so he will act like he is doing you a favor by employing you.

resp.text:
As the owner of Hall’s Motorsports, I take this comment very seriously.  We have many talented women in our organization and I value their contributions to our success greatly. Women hold the highest positions in our organization and will continue to do so.

We have no record of a Margie Rathers working for us, but I am sorry she feels the way she does. I am available for a discussion on these and any other matters where our employees or customers feel diminished in any way.

Trent Hall
www.visithalls.com

name: mitch wilson
text: awesome service alway nice and easy to work with always fast to get parts and awesome to deal with!

name: Jaye J
text: Have a very heard time with customer service, no emails or call back they have all my personal information and didn't help me......

name: Joe Washington
text: Great people no hassle financing

name: RFRMOBILE 43
text: Great service and they know motorcycles. Very competitive pricing. This is my third bike from them in about fifteen years.

name: Patrick Russell
text: Great items to choose from and awesome sevice.

name: Devil Teddy
text: Lovely place, lovely people, and straight to the point.

name: Steff Richardson
text: Alex was a bad A$$ sales rep. He answered all our questions and so polite and professional. If you need a new bike or toy check out this place.

name: Ruby Tadlock
text: Used to buy oil for our bike. Changed hands mostly dirt bikes now

name: Brandon Englund
text: Sam really helped me out with everything I needed. Great people. Would recommend everyone to them.

name: Josh Trice
text: Great service always willing to help with out being pushy. Great knowledge of parts and products. Would recommend to a friend 7 days a week!

name: Gary Rodgers Jr
text: Buy all my parts from here, awesome company with friendly people. Will always come back

name: Nicholas Tyler
text: If youve never been you should Ive grown up around this shop since I was six years old buying anything from bike parts tiger they have what you want and need to make your experience the thrill of a lifetime!

name: John the Revelator
text: Unfortunately, I can not give the Crook (AKA Trent Hall) zero stars. I would avoid this place.

name: Timothy Cox
text: The guys who worked here gave excellent service and helped me with all my questions.

name: Joel Ross
text:
My Pioneer broke down and Honda would not warranty it.
Halls quoted me $5300 to fix it after keeping it for 5 weeks and charged me $525 to tell me that!
I paid $9500 for it brand new.
I got it fixed by Hattiesburg Honda for $2900.
Be careful. They will quote you things that aren't even broken.
It's worth the hour drive to Hattiesburg.

name: Mark Smith
text: I have to say that the mechanics at halls are great . Wouldn't even dream of going anywhere else!

name: alex cochran
text: Bought my first bike from here. Great customer service and all around great place would definitely recommend

name: Kyle H
text: Great selection. Prices seem a bit high. The staff is very nice.

name: Matt Weaver
text: Great products at great prices. Don't spend your money anywhere else. Come check them out. Thanks for the service Destin.

name: Andrew Prasouvo
text: Service was great, sales rep helped immensely. 10/10 would shop here for everything

name: Valentin Diaz
text: They are liars. A very racist place. They dont like to hire spanish people or black people. You can see the hate in their eyes when you go there to put an aplication or buy a bike. They also lie to potential hire candidates and play to mean games to candidates. I dont recomend buying anything from them untill they make big changes to management and employees. If you dont believe me, just go there and put an app or try to buy aomething wile black or spanish.

resp.text:
The statements made by this gentleman are unequivocally not true.  We hire our employees based on qualifications and merit, and not any other reasons which this gentlement describes.  We have many talented employees throughout our company of different cultural, ethnic and racial backgrounds.  We would like to welcome anyone who is interested in Powersports to visit us - we guarantee you'll have a great time viewing our product lines!

- Hall's Motorsports Management

name: Donna Marie
text:
They must have sold my information....
I get calls about new forwheeler gear frequently now.

On top of that they were moderatly friendly and not very helpful. They kept pushing the large tread mud tires on me amongst other things... I dont do mud usually.

The best thing about this place is they do have a good selection of toys, and if they dont have it they can order it as long as it is located at a sister store. Also i have not had a chance to deal with the service department, so i can not speak on that.

name: Lantern Ranose
text: Good service, but needs to improve on client communication.

name: Deanna Anderson
text: Will always go back they are nice and very helpful.

name: lolbff brother
text: jonathan was awesome he did a good job helping me pick out a 4 wheeler.

name: Matt Laird
text: Very helpful and helpful staff. Been shopping with them for 10 years

name: Marcus Gatlin
text: Always friendly service with great prices for the brand of merchandise.

name: Christopher Wells
text: Great people! Great selection! Will keep my business here!

name: Devin Hastings
text: Great service with even better people that will help you with whatever you need  and also work with you to get you the best product for the type of riding you want to do

name: Ken Lee
text: great sales staff very helpful will do business again jonathan was great in explaining everything about what i was buying.

name: Doranne Davis
text: The Guys Here Are Awesome !!!!

name: ANDREW XXX
text: HORRIBLE COMPANY... I HAVE BOUGHT SEVERAL THINGS FROM THEM OVER THE YEARS BUT LAST 5 TIMES I TRIED DOING BUSINESS THEY TRIED ADDING ON ALL SORT OF FEES THAT CAUSE THE PRODUCT TO GO WAY OVER MSRP.... THEY ADVERTISE ONE PRICE BUT WHEN U TRY TO BUY THEY ADD 500 TO 1200 IN FEES ON TOP OF SALE PRICE. STAY CLEAR OF THESE CROOKS. THEY QUOTED ME 1990.00 FOR A PW50 FOR MY SON. MSRP IS  1449.00 ON THE  PW50!!!!! SAME BIKE AT SOUTH MISSISSIPPI POWER SPORTS OT THE DOOR  IS UNDER 1600.00 BUYERS BEWARE! YEAH YOU MIGHT SEE A FEW GOOD REVIEWS BUT I ASSURE YOU THOSE ARE EITHER FRIENDS OF EMPLOYEES OR PAID FOR THROUGH ADVERTISING COMPANIES! THIS COMPANY WILL TRY TO PULL THE WOOL OVER YOUR EYES! PLEASE BEFORE YOU COMMIT SHOP AROUND! THEY ARE NOT THE ONLY DEALER!

name: Ryan Earl
text: Great employees with good customer service

name: Gregory Goff
text: Great place looking bikes and accessories

name: Tyler Lawrence
text: Great service. Great employes roll tide.

name: Justin Taylor
text: Excellent service, worked here for 10 months.

name: logan brewer
text: Had great dealings with these guys . good people !!

name: Will D
text: Awesome service and look out for their customers!

name: T File
text: honda is a great bramd of atvs and other items. i am proud to be a honda owner myself . ive never had problems out of them at all and plan on staying with them as long as ican

name: Cindy Mcgoogan
text:
I needed front brake pads for my Harley Davidson XR1200. The Harley shop didn't have any but said they could get some in 3 to 5 days.

Then I went to Halls Honda. The parts guy didn't laugh when I said I was looking for a Harley part. I explained the XR model Harley uses the same dual Nissin calipers as the Honda CBR900, CBR600, VTR1000 and several other models.

The parts guy took the time to research and found two sets of pads in stock for me to choose from.....  and at a great price. I was very impressed.

Based on this I would not hesitate to recommend Halls Honda for parts. This was a pleasant and surprising experience, I will be back. Thanks Halls.

name: Alyson Pynes
text: Jonathan was an exceptional salesman. He went out of his way to price parts for me for my new pioneer.

name: Sharla Taylor
text: Great Place! Amazing Staff!! Our new Motorcycle Family!!!!
